description:
Tensions heighten on Rakuyo as several factions arrive on the scene and confront one another.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Arc de la bataille finale de Rakuyô 3 - Le chant du guerrier
Battle on Rakuyo Arc: Part 3 - The Song of Samurai
Rakuyou Kessen Hen San: Bushi no Uta
洛陽決戦篇三 武士の唄
